text: Kar atrivimɨn ingangarir a damuamim: ofan bar isia mɨghɨriba, ko wit tuamin ofaba, ko wain ko olivɨn borem inger ofaba ko, dughiar ekiabar isaba ko, iakɨnir igiabar dabirabiba ko, Sabatɨn dughiaba ko, Israelɨn ikɨzimɨn dughiar ekiar igharazir God inabaziba. Atrivim, Israelɨn ikɨzimɨn arazir kuraba agɨvsɨ, ofan kabar amuam. Ofan kabanang: arazir kuraba gɨn amadir ofaba ko, wit tuamin ofaba ko, ofan isia bar mɨghɨriba ko, God gumazamiziba ko navir vamɨran ikiamin ofaba.”
